languages.text: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer's area attack damages at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer automatically repeats this attack, but becomes immobilized until the start of their next turn.

When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} damages at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the round, the wearer gains +2 AP, and this attack does not count towards their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}首次使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，对2格内至少两名敌人造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者会获得2点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}，且此次攻击不计入本回合攻击上限。不过，装备者会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态，直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。
languages.original_text: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}对2格内至少两名敌人造成伤害时，装备者都会再次发动此次攻击，但会陷入定身状态，直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。

languages.text: Когда персонаж, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} хотя бы двум противникам в радиусе 2 клеток от себя впервые за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}, он получает +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, а атака не входит в лимит атак на ход. Затем персонаж оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижен{/g} до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} damages at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer, the wearer automatically repeats this attack but becomes immobilised until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, наносит урон хотя бы двум противникам в радиусе 2 клеток от себя, он автоматически совершает эту атаку повторно, но оказывается обездвижен до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда персонаж, совершая {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g}, наносит урон хотя бы двум противникам в радиусе 2 клеток от себя, он автоматически совершает эту атаку повторно, но оказывается обездвижен до начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に初めて、使用者から半径2マス以内にいる2体以上の敵に、使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えると、使用者は2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を獲得し、この攻撃は攻撃制限にカウントされない。その後、使用者は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}が開始するまで{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 自身から半径2セル以内の少なくとも２体の敵に対して{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}のダメージを与える度、自動的にこの攻撃を繰り返し、次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の最初まで移動不可になる。

languages.text: Cada vez que un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} del portador {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dañe{/g} a al menos dos enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, obtiene 2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA {/g} y el ataque no cuenta para el límite del turno. Acto seguido, queda {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g} hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} del portador dañen a al menos dos enemigos en un radio de 2 casillas a su alrededor, vuelve a lanzar ese ataque, pero queda inmovilizado hasta el comienzo de su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des Trägers zum ersten Mal während der {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} mindestens zwei Feinden innerhalb eines 2-Felder-Radius des Trägers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden zufügt{/g}, erhält der Träger +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und sein Angriff zählt nicht für sein Angriffslimit. Der Träger wird dann bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des Trägers mindestens zwei Feinden innerhalb eines 2-Zellen-Radius des Trägers Schaden zufügt, wiederholt der Träger automatisch diesen Angriff, wird jedoch bis zum Beginn seines nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} gelähmt.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qui inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à au moins deux ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui pour la première fois du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, il bénéficie de +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et cette attaque n'est pas comptabilisée dans son nombre maximum d'attaques. L'utilisateur est ensuite {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisé{/g} jusqu'au début de son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damages{/g} at least two enemies within a 2-cell radius from the wearer for the first time during the {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, the wearer gains +2 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, and this attack does not count toward their attack limit. The wearer then becomes {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g} until the start of their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qui inflige des dégâts à au moins deux ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour de lui, il répète automatiquement cette attaque mais est immobilisé jusqu'au début de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
